basic.description: Operating systems for conventional shared memory computers. System services and system calls, concurrent processes and scheduling, synchronization and communication, deadlock. File systems and protection, memory management and virtual memory, device management and drivers. Unix operating system. Introduction to real-time and distributed systems.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Operating Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of (ELEC274 or CISC231) and (ELEC 278 or CISC 235) and registration in a BSCE Academic Program is required.
